title: Shaun Woodward – 2011 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Shaun Woodward to Labour Party conference on 29th September 2011.
content:
Conference, when history looks back on the great achievements of Labour in Government, the Peace Process in Northern Ireland will rank high.
